item.description: I’m a researcher focused on financial intermediation and credit access, climate resilience, women’s economic opportunities, and digital information services in low- and middle-income countries. I use rigorous empirical methods to generate evidence that is grounded in context and relevant to policy. I received a PhD from the Department of Agricultural and Resource Economics at the University of California, Berkeley, and was until recently a postdoctoral researcher at Precision Development.
